uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools
Class ShapefileWriter

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools.ShapefileWriter
public class ShapefileWriter
extends java.lang.Object

A class to simplify the process of writing an ESRI(r) Shapefile. It can be constructed from a theme or an array of themes.

Author:
James Macgill, Center for computational Geography., Ian Turton, Center for computational Geography. $Id$
